g.text: Reprocess G4X-data with a new segmentation
Takes new cell-labels from a custom segmentation output and re-assigns transcripts
and protein signals to those cells. The operation recreates most single-cell
outputs and initializes a new G4X-viewer "segmentation.bin" file. Does not
Directory containing G4X-data for a single sample
Key/column in npz/geojson where labels should be
taken from (optional, but required for .npz with
Edit G4X-data in-place if this flag is set.
